mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MYTASKS_LIST M , USER_PROJECT_LIST P , USER_TEAM_LIST T , USER_INFO I , PROJECT_LIST J WHERE I.USER_CODE = T.USER_CODE AND T.USER_TEAM_CODE = P.USER_TEAM_CODE AND P.USER_PROJECT_CODE = M.USER_PROJECT_CODE AND P.PROJECT_CODE = J.PROJECT_CODE AND I.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MYTASKS_START_DATE, MYTASKS_START_TIME, MYTASKS_TODO_YN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTASKS_LIST VALUES(SEQ_MYTASKS.NEXTVAL, #{myTaskscontents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myTasksstartDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myTasksstartTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9/24, 'hh24:mi:ss'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9/24, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9/24, 'hh24:mi:ss'), #{userProjectCode, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DEFAULT, 'N')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MYTASKS_LIST WHERE MYTASKS_CODE = #{myTasksCode, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MYTASKS_LIST M , USER_PROJECT_LIST P , USER_TEAM_LIST T , USER_INFO I , PROJECT_LIST J , MYTASKS_SHARE_LIST S WHERE I.USER_CODE = T.USER_CODE AND T.USER_TEAM_CODE = P.USER_TEAM_CODE AND P.USER_PROJECT_CODE = M.USER_PROJECT_CODE AND P.PROJECT_CODE = J.PROJECT_CODE AND M.MYTASKS_CODE = S.MYTASKS_CODE AND I.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MYTASKS_SHARE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MYTASKS_START_DATE, MYTASKS_START_TIME, MYTASKS_TODO_YN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTASKS_SHARE_LIST VALUES(SEQ_MYTASKS_SHARE.NEXTVAL, #{mytasksShareType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9/24, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 9/24, 'hh24:mi:ss'), #{myTasksCode, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
